newsitem.title: USA: Cayenne sees 10 pct rev rise in Dec qtr.
newsitem.headline: Cayenne sees 10 pct rev rise in Dec qtr.

text.p: Cayenne Software Inc said its revenue for the December quarter increased 10 percent from the same quarter a year ago.
The company did not say how the increase would specifically effect its earnings. The company said its pre-tax income would be "in a range of four percent to six percent of revenue."
It also did not have a specific revenue number for the same quarter last year, when Cayenne was two separate companies.
A company spokesman declined to comment.
The company also said its gross margins improved for the quarter and its operating expenses were about $10.7 million -- a more than 25 percent decline from a year ago.
